title: Attested Policy Mandate v1
description: Defines the structure for a finalized, verifiable policy update instruction.

mandate_id.description: Sequential, monotonic ID for change tracking.

version.description: Semantic version of the affected policies (e.g., PVLM v3.1.2).

payload_hashes.description: Cryptographic hashes (SHA-512) of the manifests being ratified.

co_signatures.description: Required signatures from Triumvirate agents (minimum two).

final_signature.description: Cryptographic signature of the entire APM payload, affixed by CRoT.
